meanings.sent1: After the accident, he experienced epistaxis and had to go to the doctor.
meanings.sent2: She gets epistaxis frequently during allergy season.
meanings.sent3: The clown's red nose looked like it was having an epistaxis party!
meanings.sent4: The epistaxis of emotions overflowed from her like a burst dam.
meanings.sent5: The sight of epistaxis in the movie made everyone gasp in shock.
